rooms.description: Spacious entrance with traditional Kerala motifs and a waiting area for guests.
Open plan living area with a central traditional Kerala-style seating arrangement.
Open dining space integrated with the living room, designed for family gatherings.
A room to accommodate visitors, with traditional Kerala design elements.
Dedicated home office space designed for work efficiency, with traditional decor and ample natural light.
A quiet library space with built-in shelves and a reading area, designed in a traditional Kerala aesthetic.
Shared kitchen and utility space for the joint family, designed to cater to multiple users.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with traditional design and ample space.

openings.location: Adjacent to each bedroom (ensuring a spacious view and ample ventilation as per Vastu)
openings.details: Each balcony designed with traditional Kerala-style railings and sufficient space for wheelchair maneuverability.
Large windows ensuring maximum natural light, aligned according to Vastu for energy flow.
Wider doorways (minimum 3 ft) to ensure wheelchair accessibility and ease of movement.
